definition: great valley/Grand Canyon of Colorado River
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
the Grand Canyon of the Nujiang river in Tibet and Yunnan

pinyin: Ke1 luo2 la1 duo1 da4 xia2 gu3

definition: Great Canyon of Yarlung Tsangpo-Brahmaputra (through the southeast Himalayas, from Tibet to Assam and Bangladesh)
pinyin: Ya3 lu3 zang4 bu4 Da4 xia2 gu3

sentences.english: Today, Han Jia and I will bring you to Linzhou to take a look at the Grand Taihang Canyon.
sentences.chinese: 今天我和韩佳就要带你去林州的太行大峡谷看一看。

sentences.english: To the west of the mountains is San Joaquin Valley, the southern half of the Central Valley.
sentences.chinese: 西面的山岭是圣华金河谷，中央大峡谷的南半部分。

sentences.english: We arrive at the Grand Canyon the next morning.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早晨，我们终于到了大峡谷。

sentences.english: There is natural water black painting Grand Canyon of wonderful workmanship excelling nature.
sentences.chinese: 有巧夺天工的天然水墨丹青大峡谷。

sentences.english: See a dimensional large-screen motion picture about the Grand Canyon in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 晚上看有关大峡谷的立体大屏幕电影。

sentences.english: Velvet black shadows emphasize their brilliance, while the depths of the canyon are flooded by an ocean of vermilion dusk.
sentences.chinese: 而大峡谷的深处正沐浴在一派朱红的暮色苍茫中。

sentences.english: Where was the writer facing on the edge of the Grand Canyon?
sentences.chinese: 站在大峡谷的边缘，作者是面对哪方的？

sentences.english: Here is the typical scenic spot of spring in Mt. Huaying gorge.
sentences.chinese: 此为华蓥山大峡谷涌泉景观的典型代表。

sentences.english: Now it is time for you to walk on air for 70 feet over the Grand Canyon.
sentences.chinese: 现在是时候让你自己在大峡谷上腾云驾雾70英尺了。

sentences.english: The Grand Canyon is one of the wonders of the world.
sentences.chinese: 科罗拉多大峡谷是世界奇观之一。

sentences.english: There are limitless opportunities for photography at the Grand Canyon.
sentences.chinese: 在大峡谷国家公园有无限摄影的机会。

sentences.english: Why not see the Grand Canyon in Arizona, USA, on horseback?
sentences.chinese: 何不骑马游览美国亚利桑那州的大峡谷？

sentences.english: They are the so-called White-Cloud Houses.
sentences.chinese: 那就是浙西大峡谷的白云人家。

sentences.english: The Jingdong Grand Canyon and the hoodoo canyon are Pinggu County's natural scenic spots.
sentences.chinese: 京东大峡谷与石林峡都是平谷县的自然风景区。

sentences.english: The setting sun strikes the Grand Canyon's North Rim.
sentences.chinese: 夕阳照在大峡谷的北坡上。

sentences.english: Han Jia, how long is the Zhexi Grand Canyon?
sentences.chinese: 韩佳，浙西大峡谷到底有多长啊？

pinyin: Ke1 luo2 la1 duo1 da4 xia2 gu3

definition: Stone Forest, notable set of limestone formations in Yunnan
